solution_line_template: Jerry has to walk to the sink/recycling bin {total_cans} cans / {cans_per_trip} cans per trip = <<{total_cans}/{cans_per_trip}={number_of_trips}>>{number_of_trips} trips
The round trip takes {time_per_way} seconds per way * {ways_in_round_trip} ways = <<{time_per_way}*{ways_in_round_trip}={round_trip_time}>>{round_trip_time} seconds

Counting the time he spent pouring out the cans and the time the round trip took, he spent {round_trip_time} seconds per trip + {drain_time_per_trip} seconds per trip = <<{round_trip_time}+{drain_time_per_trip}={total_time_per_trip}>>{total_time_per_trip} seconds per trip

With {number_of_trips} round trips, he spent {total_time_per_trip} seconds per trip * {number_of_trips} trips = <<{total_time_per_trip}*{number_of_trips}={total_time_spent}>>{total_time_spent} seconds
